content.description: Your session on PDND Interoperabilità has expired. You are about to be redirected to Self Care

reason.label: Reason
reason.infoLabel: Enter the reason for rejecting the fruition request. Min 20 characters, max 1000 characters.

subtitle.changePlan: By rejecting this plan change, the consumer will still be able to continue using the previously available quota.
subtitle.newPurpose: By rejecting this purpose, the consumer will not be able to access your e-service data.

infoLabel.changePlan: Enter the reason for rejecting the plan change. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters
infoLabel.newPurpose: Enter the reason for rejecting the purpose. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

personalDataDrawer.title: Does this {{where}} process personal data?
personalDataDrawer.subtitle: For this {{where}}, it is necessary to indicate whether personal data is processed.
personalDataDrawer.alertForAPIOperator: Consult with the administrator before confirming. Once saved, this data can no longer be changed.
personalDataDrawer.alertLabel: Once saved, this data can no longer be changed.

content.subtitle: A more recent version of the e-service <1>{{eservice}}, version {{version}}</1>, provided by {{provider}}, has been published.

description.title: What does it mean?
description.content: When a producer publishes a new version of an e-service, there are variations compared to the previous one. These changes may be administrative, technical, or both. Do you have any doubts? <1>See the guide.</1>

checkboxesForm.title: What is recommended to do before updating?
checkboxesForm.attributesCheckLabel: The administrative staff verified compliance with the requirements (attributes) requested by the producer.
checkboxesForm.apiIntegrationCheckLabel: The technical staff verified that your integration corresponds to the updated API of the e-service.
checkboxesForm.testEnvCheckLabel: The technical staff tested the integration with the updated e-service in a test environment (if available).

content.missingVerifiedOrDeclaredAttributesAlert: The new request will not be active immediately; your organization does not have all the necessary attributes. A draft will be produced which you will be asked to complete. Once done, you can forward it to the producer to request the update.

upgrade.label: Update
upgrade.notAllCheckboxCheckedTooltip: To be able to update, check all the boxes above

dialogClonePurpose.title: Confirm Purpose Cloning
dialogClonePurpose.description: A new purpose will be created in draft status with the same characteristics as the one selected. Select the e-service to associate it with.

alertPersonalData.title: La finalità non è compatibile con l’e-service selezionato
alertPersonalData.description: La finalità da clonare indica un trattamento sui dati personali diverso da quanto definito dall’erogatore dell’e-service, pertanto non ti è consentita la pubblicazione. Per procedere, crea una nuova finalità rispettando il vincolo sui dati personali.

alertRiskAnalysisRulesetExpiring.title: The selected purpose uses a risk analysis that will soon be obsolete
alertRiskAnalysisRulesetExpiring.description: The purpose you are cloning uses a risk analysis model that will no longer be publishable after {{expirationDate}}. Publish the purpose by that date or create a new one at any time. Existing ones remain valid.

dialogCreateAgreementDraft.title: Create Service Request Draft
dialogCreateAgreementDraft.description: Do you want to create a service request draft for the e-service **{{eserviceName}}**, version **{{eserviceVersion}}**? Select the party for which to submit the request

certifiedAttributesAlert.title: It is not possible to request the consumption of the e-service
certifiedAttributesAlert.description: The selected party does not have the certified attributes required to request the consumption of the e-service

description.inspect: Select the tenant for which you want to inspect the agreement.
description.edit: Select the tenant for which you want to complete the agreement.

dialogDeleteOperator.title: Forwarding to Members Area for User Removal
dialogDeleteOperator.description: User operations on all products managed by PagoPA take place through the Members Area portal. By clicking "confirm", you will be redirected to the Members Area page to manage the selected user.

dialogRemoveOperatorFromClient.title: Confirm User Removal
dialogRemoveOperatorFromClient.description: By clicking “confirm”, the current user will be removed from the current client and will no longer have access to it. For continuity, all keys uploaded by this user will remain available in the client. For security reasons, it is recommended to replace them and discard the old ones. Do you have any doubts? <1>Read the guide</1>.

content.description: If you revoke the {{attributeName}} attribute from the {{tenantName}} party, it will lose access to all the e-services for which it has an active service request, immediately interrupting the use of the service.
content.checkbox: I confirm that I understand the consequences of revocation

drawerRejectReason.title: Rejection Reason
drawerRejectReason.defaultServiceString:
---

Thank you for your cooperation,

the Interoperability Team.
drawerRejectReason.guideLinkLabel: For further questions and information. Go to the manual.

dialogSetTenantMail.title: Enter Contact Email
dialogSetTenantMail.description: The address entered has no legal value. It will be shown on PDND Interoperabilità as a reference point to facilitate the direct exchange of information between parties (e.g. requests for support and clarification, etc.)

dialogRemoveUserFromKeychain.title: Confirm User Removal
dialogRemoveUserFromKeychain.description: The current user will be removed from the current keychain and will no longer have access to it. All keys uploaded by this person will remain available in the keychain. It is recommended to replace them and discard the old ones. To find out more, <1>read the guide</1>

dialogDeleteProducerKeychainKey.title: Confirm Public Key Deletion
dialogDeleteProducerKeychainKey.description: The key can no longer be used to sign responses to consumers of your e-services. To find out more, <1>read the guide</1>.

content.description: Please remember that it is necessary to have been appointed as **Data Processor** of personal data, by signing the deed required by art. 28 of the GDPR, before starting any processing activity via the infrastructure on behalf of the Delegator, **Data Controller**.

reason.label: Reason
reason.infoLabel: Enter the reason why you reject the delegation. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

content.description: The delegate will lose management of your e-service {{eserviceName}} with producer delegation, and the service requests and the purposes associated with it. The e-service will return under your control in the state it was in at the time of revocation. Do you have doubts? <1>Read the guide.
content.checkbox: I have read and I want to proceed with the revocation

content.description:
By revoking the delegation, you will take possession of the requests and purposes created by the delegate for consumption on behalf of your institution and you will be able to manage them independently, or create a new delegation. Do you have doubts? <1>Consult the guide.

After revocation, you will have to reactivate and/or create the purposes and associate your clients to be able to access the e-service data again {{eserviceName}} with consumer delegation.
content.checkbox: I have read and I want to proceed with the revocation

dialogRejectDelegatedVersionDraft.title: Reject Publication
dialogRejectDelegatedVersionDraft.description: The reason for your rejection will be reported to your delegate, who will be able to update the draft and send it back to you for approval for publication.

reason.label: Reason
reason.infoLabel: Enter the reason why you reject publication. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

dialogApproveDelegatedVersionDraft.title: Publish Version
dialogApproveDelegatedVersionDraft.description: You are about to publish a new version of your e-service {{eserviceName}} with producer delegation developed by your delegate {{delegateName}}. At the same time, you approve the risk analyses compiled by the delegate acting on your behalf.

content.description: Indicate who will be able to use the risk analysis you are creating and whether personal data is being processed.
content.label: Target entity type

options.labelPA: Public Administrations (Art. 2, paragraph 2, letter “a” of the CAD)
options.labelNotPA: Public service managers, publicly controlled companies (Art. 2, paragraph 2, letters “b” and “c”) or Private entities

personalDataRadioBtn.label: Does the risk analysis involve the processing of personal data?
personalDataRadioBtn.error: Indicate whether personal data will be processed

options.true: Yes, personal data will be processed
options.false: No, personal data will not be processed

dropzone.label: Drag the file here or click to select it from your computer

apiInfoSection.title: Interoperability API
apiInfoSection.content: Useful parameters to obtain information programmatically through <1>your interop API clients</1>

content.uat: Testing environment. Do not use real data.
content.att: Validation environment for private entities: be careful, the data must not be real

maintenanceBanner.bodySingleDay: PDND Interoperabilità will undergo scheduled maintenance on {{maintenanceStartDay}} at {{maintenanceStartHour}} for approximately {{hoursDuration}} hours. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
maintenanceBanner.bodyMultipleDay: PDND Interoperabilità will undergo scheduled maintenance from {{maintenanceStartHour}} on {{maintenanceStartDay}} to {{maintenanceEndHour}} on {{maintenanceEndDay}}. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

notificationsBanner.title: Notifications are here!
notificationsBanner.body: We will inform you when there are news of your interest directly on the platform or via personal email. Check the manual and set your preferences now.

tooltipTitle.ARCHIVED: This e-service has been archived and can no longer be associated
tooltipTitle.SUSPENDED: This e-service has been suspended and can no longer be associated

warning.ARCHIVED: This e-service has been archived and can no longer be associated. Remove it before proceeding
warning.SUSPENDED: This e-service has been suspended and can no longer be associated. Remove it before proceeding

riskAnalysisNameSection.title: Purpose
riskAnalysisNameSection.description: Indicate a use case for which you intend to collect data and complete the risk analysis.

riskAnalysisSection.title: Risk Analysis
riskAnalysisSection.description: The questions in the questionnaire will vary based on the answers provided as you proceed. Changing the answer to a previous question may change the subsequent questions.

personalDataFlag.label: Personal data processing
personalDataFlag.true: You have declared that you process personal data
personalDataFlag.false: You have declared that you do not process personal data
personalDataFlag.undefined: You did not answer the question about personal data processing

personalDataValuesAlert.labelForEserviceCreateStep2: Please ensure that the answer to this question matches the one you indicated in the general information of the e-service. If the data does not match, the publication of this purpose will be blocked.
personalDataValuesAlert.alertForIncompatibleAnswer: Please ensure that the answer to the question "Indicate whether you access personal data (required)" matches the one you indicated in the general information. If the data does not match, the publication will be blocked.

labelForPurposeCreate.YES: You will not be able to publish this purpose because you have declared that personal data is processed, but the producer has declared otherwise. For clarification, contact the producer.
labelForPurposeCreate.NO: You will not be able to publish this purpose because you have declared that personal data is not processed, but the producer has declared otherwise. For clarification, contact the producer.

riskAnalysisSection.personalDataAlert: Be careful not to enter personal data in the free text fields

eserviceTemplateRiskAnalysis.title: Indicate who will be able to use the following risk analysis.
eserviceTemplateRiskAnalysis.description: Indicate for whom the following risk analysis is being completed.

tenantKind.labelPA: Public Administration (Art. 2, paragraph 2, letter “a” of the Digital Administration Code)
tenantKind.labelNotPA: Public service managers, publicly controlled companies (Art. 2, paragraph 2, letters “b” and “c”) or Private entities

purposeTemplateRiskAnalysisInfoSummary.notEditableTooltip: The template creator does not allow changes to this field

documents.notAvailableYet: The document will be available soon
